title: Drew Peterson // 64
description:
In 2004, a young mother of 2 died tragically in her home in the Chicago suburbs. 3 years later, her husband's new wife disappeared. So, is this a coincidence, or did the husband have something to do with two of his wife's untimely deaths? This is the story Kathleen Savio, Stacy Cales, and the man they both married: Drew Peterson.
________
